0.text:
Innate: Vayne gains  30 bonus movement speed while facing a nearby  visible enemy champion.
 Final Hour Bonus: The bonus movement speed is tripled to 90.
0.html:
Innate: Vayne gains  30 bonus movement speed while facing a nearby visible enemy champion.

Final Hour Bonus: The bonus movement speed is tripled to 90.
markedPassages: 30 bonus movement speed
visible
Final Hour

0.text: Active: Vayne  dashes a fixed distance in the target direction, though not through terrain, and empowers her next basic attack within 7 seconds to deal bonus physical damage.
0.html: Active: Vayne dashes a fixed distance in the target direction, though not through terrain, and empowers her next basic attack within 7 seconds to deal bonus physical damage.
markedPassages: dashes

1.text: Tumble  resets Vayne's basic attack timer.
1.html: Tumble resets Vayne's basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Tumble  resets Vayne's basic attack timer.

0.text: Passive: Vayne's basic attacks  on-hit and  Condemn apply a stack of Silver Bolts for 3.5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications, expiring upon attacking a new enemy, and stacking up to 3 times.
0.html: Passive: Vayne's basic attacks on-hit and Condemn apply a stack of Silver Bolts for 3.5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications, expiring upon attacking a new enemy, and stacking up to 3 times.
markedPassages: on-hit
Condemn

1.text: The third stack consumes them all to deal  bonus true damage, with a minimum threshold. This damage is capped at 200 against  monsters.
1.html: The third stack consumes them all to deal  bonus true damage, with a minimum threshold. This damage is capped at 200 against monsters.
markedPassages: bonus true damage
monsters

0.text: Active: Vayne fires a heavy bolt at the target enemy that deals physical damage and  knocks them back 475 units, though not through terrain.
0.html: Active: Vayne fires a heavy bolt at the target enemy that deals physical damage and knocks them back 475 units, though not through terrain.
markedPassages: knocks them back

1.text: If the target collides with terrain, they take  bonus physical damage and become  stunned for 1.5 seconds.
1.html: If the target collides with terrain, they take bonus physical damage and become stunned for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: stunned

0.text: Active: Vayne equips her crossbow, gaining  bonus attack damage and tripling  Night Hunter's bonus for a duration.
0.html: Active: Vayne equips her crossbow, gaining  bonus attack damage and tripling Night Hunter's bonus for a duration.
markedPassages: bonus attack damage
Night Hunter's

1.text: Additionally,  Tumble becomes empowered with a reduced  cooldown, and grants Vayne  invisibility for 1 second. Attacking or casting  Condemn breaks the stealth immediately.
1.html: Additionally, Tumble becomes empowered with a reduced  cooldown, and grants Vayne invisibility for 1 second. Attacking or casting Condemn breaks the stealth immediately.
markedPassages: Tumble
cooldown
invisibility
Condemn

2.text: Scoring an enemy champion  takedown within 3 seconds of damaging them will extend Final Hour's duration by 4 seconds, up to its original duration.
2.html: Scoring an enemy champion takedown within 3 seconds of damaging them will extend Final Hour's duration by 4 seconds, up to its original duration.
markedPassages: takedown

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+50 attack damage
+20% attack speed
+20% critical strike chance
+7% life steal

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 250 − 630 (based on level) damage for 3 seconds and 15 − 35 (based on level) bonus attack damage for 8 seconds (90 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 bonus attack damage and 70 bonus health.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – LIFELINE: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a  shield that absorbs 250 − 630 (based on level) damage for 3 seconds and 15 − 35 (based on level) bonus attack damage for 8 seconds (90 second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  +  600

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+45% attack speed
+20% critical strike chance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Wrath: Convert every 1% critical strike chance into 2 bonus physical damage on-hit, capped at 100% critical strike chance, for a maximum of 200 bonus physical damage on-hit. This damage is affected by critical strike modifiers.
Unique – Seething Strike: Basic attacks on-attack grant a stack for 6 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks on-attack to trigger a Phantom Hit that applies on-hit effects to the target at 100% effectiveness after a 0.15 second delay.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – WRATH: Convert every 1% critical strike chance into 2 bonus physical damage on-hit, capped at 100% critical strike chance, for a maximum of 200 bonus physical damage on-hit. This damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  900

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 attack damage
+25% attack speed
+8% life steal

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Mist's Edge: Basic attacks deal bonus physical damage on-hit equal to ( 12% / 9%) of the target's current health, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.
Unique – Siphon: Basic attacks on-hit against enemy champions apply a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to deal 40 − 103 (based on level) bonus magic damage on-hit and slow the target by 25% for 2 seconds, while also granting you 25% bonus movement speed for the same duration (30 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MIST'S EDGE: Basic attacks deal bonus physical damage on-hit equal to ( 12% /  9%) of the target's current health, with a minimum of 15 against all units and a maximum of 60 against minions and monsters.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  525

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Humility: Unleash a shockwave around you that slows nearby enemies by 55% for 2 seconds (60 second cooldown; 500 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – HUMILITY: Unleash a shockwave around you that  slows nearby enemies by 55% for 2 seconds (60 second cooldown;  500 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rock Solid: Every first incoming instance of post-mitigation basic damage per cast instance is reduced by 5 (+ 3.5 per 1000 maximum health), maximum 40% reduction each.
Unique – Critical Resilience: Reduces incoming critical strike damage from basic attacks by 20%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ROCK SOLID: Every first incoming instance of post-mitigation  basic damage per cast instance is reduced by 5 (+ 3.5 per 1000 maximum health), maximum 40% reduction each.

+40 magic resistance

active.originText: UNIQUE – QUICKSILVER: Removes all  crowd control debuffs (except  Airborne) from your champion and grants 50% bonus total movement speed and  ghosting for 1.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).
